title: Kurayami Santa
synopsis: In the midst of Shouwa era Japan, greed runs rampant through the bustling cities and communities of the nation. King of Hell Enma Daiou summons an envoy into his office in the form of a small boy named Kurayami Santa. Through Enma's debriefing, Santa learns that the amount of greed and selfish behavior produced by humans will soon create an enormous wave of souls entering into Hell simultaneously, which would be catastrophic for Hell itself.
staff: [['Hirose, Motoki', ['Producer']], ['Nakamura, Manabu', ['Director', ' Episode Director']], ['Nishikawa, Shinji', ['Episode Director']], ['Kumamoto, Hiromu', ['Script']]]
